root.name: Avernum
root.description: OverviewYou have been cast down into the dark, volcanic pits of Avernum, filled with foul monsters, constant warfare, and thousands and thousands of your fellow prisoners. This is your punishment for not fitting in, for speaking out against the powers that be, for being an inconvenience to the government of the cruel Emperor Hawthorne. You have been sentenced to life imprisonment in the caverns, eventually to die there, forgotten and unmourned.You as a player have to escape.The game was part of a remake years later called Avernum: Escape from the PitOriginal System RequirementsAvernum requires either a PC or 100% compatible running Windows or a PowerPC Macintosh. Minimum system requirements: 10 MB free RAM, 20 MB hard drive space,800x600 screen resolution. 16 bit color strongly recommended. Avernum v2.0 runs natively under Macintosh OS X.Steam System RequirementsOperating system:Windows® XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7Processor:1.6 GHz CPUMemory:512 MBHard disk space:300MBVideo: OpenGL compliant graphics cardSound:Sound card
